name: Click for Biscuits
description:
Click for Biscuits is an incremental / management game about food, recipes, and discovery.

Start out by making simple, bland hardtack biscuits and grow a massive food empire by hiring helpers, unlocking skills, buying new ingredients, managing imports and exports, and creating custom recipes.

Click for Biscuits is still in development, so content is being added and changed regularly. If you have feedback or suggestions, please post them here -- I'd love to hear them!
